constituent: rise up, sun, day, measuring box, thousand, drop, ten, needle
heisigStory: Our image here is made up of two primitive elements: a sun and a measuring box. Just as the sun can be seen rising up in the morning from - where else - the Land of the Rising Sun, this kanji has the sun rising up out of a Japanese measuring box - the "measuring box of the rising-up sun."
koohiiStory1: This kanji does not mean "get up" or "awake." It means rising, like the rising of a salary, or a promotion. STORY: You know that your salary has RISEN UP when your MEASURING BOX has enough dollar bills in it to reach the SUN.
koohiiStory2: We Measure the Sun to decide when we should Rise Up out of bed.
words:
上昇(じょうしょう): rising, ascending, climbing
昇進(しょうしん): promotion
昇る(のぼる): to arise, to ascend, to go up
